name: Agua
description:
Agua is a short, meditative experience about taking care of a plant. Keep it watered and it will grow, neglect it and it will wilt.

Agua was made for the 2016 One-Button Game Jam.

Music Credit:

"Relaxing Piano Music" Kevin MacLeod (incompetech.com)
